projects.title: Sparky
projects.description:
A **React** web app for electrical contractors. Features **Google Maps** integration with polyline drawing for distance measurements and shareable calculations.

**Tech Stack:** `React Router` • `Tailwind CSS` • `Google Maps API`

projects.title: Jeopardy Simulator
projects.description:
An interactive **Jeopardy!** web app that brings the classic game show to your browser. Leverages my own `jeopardy-json` package for authentic game data.

**Tech Stack:** `React` • `Next.js` • `Material UI` • `TypeScript`

projects.title: jeopardy-json
projects.description:
A lightweight **Node.js** package that fetches and converts Jeopardy! games from the **J! Archive** into structured, readable JSON.

**Tech Stack:** `Node.js` • `Cheerio` • `Axios` • `JavaScript`

projects.title: login-manager
projects.description:
Create beautiful, **custom Linux login screens** without the complexity. An event-based interface for designing fully customizable themes.

**Tech Stack:** `JavaScript` • `HTML/CSS` • `Lightdm` • `Webkit2`

capstone.title: Low Power Keyword Spotting
capstone.description:
**Research project** developing energy-efficient keyword detection algorithms for embedded systems. Published in **IEEE Xplore**.

**Tech Stack:** `TensorFlow` • `Python` • `Embedded C` • `Signal Processing`
